passives.name: Stormraider
passives.effects: Dealing damage to an enemy champion equal to {{as|25% of their '''maximum''' health}} within {{fd|2.5}} seconds inflicts them with ''Squall'' (30 second cooldown, starts on ''Squall's'' application).

passives.name: Squall
passives.effects: After 2 seconds of having applied ''Squall'', strike the target with lightning, dealing {{as|125|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to them. If the target dies before being struck, they emit an electric field instantly that shocks all enemy champions in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 600 radius, dealing them the same damage.
